resources.string:
Version 1.0

This reference is intended for starting and experienced Linux users. It contains the name, synopsis and a short description of frequently used commands, frequently used vim subcommands and regular expression notation.
Not all (sub)commands are listed.

(c) Copyright 2012 AT Computing

AT Computing is a team of specialized educators and solution providers in the field of Linux, UNIX and programming: your one-stop shop for Linux and UNIX knowledge transfer.

Email: info@atcomputing.nl
Website: www.atcomputing.nl
POSIX extended expressions – ERE\nAdditions/deviations to BRE
Perl regular expressions – PCRE\nAdditions to ERE
